title: 'Justified' Ends With An Unpredictable, Poetic And Memorable Finale
teaser: After six seasons on the FX network, Justified ended Tuesday. "What a triumph," says critic David Bianculli who adds that he loved the finale's "touches of grace" and "emphasis on character and tone."
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
